Detailed Description

C++ manager for querying the USGS central CA velocity model (USER INTERFACE).

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum QueryEnum

Type of query.

Enumerator:
MAXRES 

Query at maximum resolution.

FIXEDRES 

Query at fixed resolution.

WAVERES 

Query at resolution tuned to wavelength of shear waves.

void open ( void  )

void query ( double **  ppVals,
const int  numVals,
const double  lon,
const double  lat,
const double  elev 
)

Query the database.

Warning:
Array for values to be returned must be allocated BEFORE query.
Note:
Longitude and latitude are given in degrees in the WGS84 datum.
Elevation is given in meters with respect to mean sea level.
Values will be returned either of the order they are shown in cencalvm::storage::PayloadStruct or as specified with a call to queryVals().
Parameters:
ppValsPointer to computed values (output from query)
numValsNumber of values expected (size of array (preallocated))
lonLongitude of location for query in degrees
latLatitude of location for query in degrees
elevElevation of location wrt MSL in meters
void queryRes ( const double  res)

Set query resolution.

Resolution is associated with vertical resolution. Vertical resolution is 4 times greater than the horizontal resolution (i.e., discretization size in vertical direction is 1/4 discretization size in horizontal direction).

Meaning depends on type of query:

  • MAXRES Resolution is not applicable
  • FIXEDRES Query etree at level corresponding to resolution (resolution is given in meters)
  • WAVERES Resolution corresponds to minimum period of waves (resolution is given in seconds); etree is queried at level corresponding to minimum wavelength for shear waves.
Parameters:
resResolution of query.
void queryType ( const QueryEnum  queryType)

Set query type.

Parameters:
queryTypeSet type of query
void queryVals ( const char *const *  names,
const int  numVals 
)

Set values to be returned by queries.

Default is to return all values in order they appear in PayloadStruct plus the elevation of topography/bathymetry (ground surface or ocean floor; the query value is 'elevation').

Parameters:
namesNames of values to be returned in queries
numValsNumber of values to be returned in queries
void squash ( const bool  flag,
const double  limit = -2000.0 
)

Set squashed topography/bathymetry flag and minimum elevation of squashing.

Squashing is turned off by default.

Parameters:
flagTrue if squashing, false otherwise.
limitMinimum elevation for squashing.
